thread.title: Scared to Be Lonely - Martin Garrix & Dua Lipa

title: Scared to Be Lonely - Martin Garrix & Dua Lipa
text: by Ahahahfn Dua Lipa is one of the best new artists out there and this song just adds to that success. Amazing vocals. Great Emotional Song by KyranP Huge Follow Ups to 'Together' and 'In The Name Of Love'. Must download and buy. 2017 is Martin's year again!!! Amazing! üòç by Poundy88 I love this! Been counting down until Friday for it to release and I am not disappointed! On repeat it goes! ‚úåüèª Biography Born: 14 May 1996 in Amsterdam, Netherlands Genre: Dance Years Active: '10s Part of the explosion of Dutch EDM DJs who emerged during the 2012-2013 season, Martin Garrix kicked off his career in a high-profile way, first landing on the dance charts with his 2012 remix of Christina Aguilera's "Your Body." Born Martijn Garritsen, the then-16-year-old DJ spent 2012 remixing Aguilera, signing with Spinnin' Records, and releasing the "BFAM" single in collaboration with Julian Jordan. In 2013 he released his solo single "Animals," which hit number one in the U.K. and reached the... Top Albums and Songs by Martin Garrix 1.
